actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension and compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of certain increases in monthly social security or railroad retirement benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that recipients of veterans' pension and compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of specified increases in monthly social security or railroad retirement benefits. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 415(g)(4)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension and compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of certain increases in monthly social security or railroad retirement benefits.
